name: chemotherapy
description: The collection of data elements describing the details of a chemotherapy treatment regimen completed by a donor. For multiple treatment agents in a single regimen, submit multiple rows in the chemotherapy file.

fields.name: program_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the ARGO program.

fields.name: submitter_donor_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the donor, assigned by the data provider.

fields.name: submitter_treatment_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the treatment, as assigned by the data provider.

fields.name: drug_rxnormid
fields.description: RxNormID assigned to the treatment regimen.

meta.notes: This field uses a controlled vocabulary gathered from the DrugBank database of drug names. Either this or a valid drug_name must be provided.

fields.name: drug_name
fields.description: Name of agent or drug administered to patient as part of the treatment regimen.

meta.notes: This field uses a controlled vocabulary gathered from the DrugBank database of drug names. Either this or a valid drug_rxnormid must be provided.

fields.name: chemotherapy_dosage_units
fields.description: Indicate units used to record chemotherapy drug dosage.

fields.name: cumulative_drug_dosage
fields.description: Indicate the total drug dose in the same units specified in chemotherapy_dosage_units.
